Dialogue.Page: Mod: Ultimate Skin Changer Author: pikpik_carrot, JohnCorby, xen, Streetlights Behind the Trees
Ultimate Skin Changer is a mod that allows you to play as other Outer Wilds characters. Gabbro, Hornfels, Solanum, Prisoner, you name it!
This mod is a great enhancement to any Quantum Space Buddies session, allowing you and your friends to distinguish one another.
The lead author of this mod, pikpik, has also released some playable skins from Team Fortress 2 and Portal as separate mods.
